item.title: Code Style: If and return
item.description: When contributing to opensource code at GitHub, I found some mistakes, or improvements when writing code, that are repetead over and over again for newbies and not so newbies developers. I’ll try to write some posts about this, but for not, let’s start with some “if” and “return” statements cases.
